name: Spider Web Attack Time To Kill
name_original: Spider Web Attack Time To Kill
description:
**I love Spider and Bugs**
*Awesome shooting arcade-style game*

Spider is in danger. Bee, Beetle, Ladybug, and other flying insects are attacking its home. Let's help him to shoot spider web to protect his home. **They are coming at you**

There are two game modes. Arcade mode has twenty levels with four spider lifes. More challenging enemy bugs can be found in higher levels. Survival mode is non-stop shooting and single spider life game. Longer you can stand and more scores you can get.

Enjoy wonderful graphics of spiders and bugs for all size screens, with an awesome soundtrack for classic shooting arcade game.

And while this is a single player game, you don't have to play single. Action games are more fun with friends, and you can try to beat your friends and strangers on the shared leaderboard (Game Services or Game center depending on platform).
